texto: training support, communications, equipment/computing resource support, and facilities. d) Manage results of maintenance and logistics. This activity consists of the following tasks: 1) Record incidents and problems, including their resolutions, and significant maintenance and logistics results. NOTE This includes anomalies due to the maintenance strategy, the maintenance enabling systems, execution of the maintenance and logistics, or incorrect system definition. The Project Assessment and Control and Quality Assurance processes are used to perform maintenance problem identification and resolution, e.g., analyze the data to identify the root cause, enable corrective or improvement actions,
